title: Cipher #1, #2 & #3 Exact Matching Targets
description: This kernel provides targets for the competition test set using exact matchings with plain-text chunks, for cipher #1, #2 & #3. It outputs two dataframes as pickles:  test_123.pkl which contains as target for cipher #1, #2 & #3 the list of all possible targets from decrypted ciphertext exact matchin (see https://www.kaggle.com/leflal/you-cannot-avoid-multiple-targets) test_sub.pkl which contains one target for cipher #1, #2 & #3 (chosen among the above list of possible targets), ready for submission  If you use the output pickle in your work, be it to cross-check your model or enhance your submission,  or if you simply appreciate this contribution,  please upvote this kernel, thanks and have a nice 2019.
description_lemmatized: kernel provides target competition test set using exact matchings plaintext chunk cipher 1 2 3 output two dataframes pickle test_123pkl contains target cipher 1 2 3 list possible target decrypted ciphertext exact matchin see httpswwwkagglecomleflalyoucannotavoidmultipletargets test_subpkl contains one target cipher 1 2 3 chosen among list possible target ready submission use output pickle work crosscheck model enhance submission simply appreciate contribution please upvote kernel thanks nice 2019
